metadata.feature_description: Export analytics data to various formats for external analysis

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Access Export Functionality in Community Analytics

steps.action: Logged in as SuperUser and navigated to PersonaBar
steps.expected: PersonaBar should be accessible with Dashboard menu visible
steps.actual: PersonaBar loaded successfully, Dashboard menu visible with submenu options

steps.action: Hovered on Dashboard menu to reveal submenu
steps.expected: Submenu should show 'Site Analytics' and 'Community Analytics' options
steps.actual: Submenu displayed correctly with both options visible

steps.action: Clicked on 'Community Analytics' to open the dashboard
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard should load with Export button visible in header
steps.actual: Panel opened but content failed to load - blank white panel displayed. JavaScript error: 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' at dashboardClass.init in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics dashboard from loading
Error: 'utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025
Export button is not accessible because dashboard content fails to render
The error occurs during dashboard initialization, blocking all functionality

observations: Code review confirms Export functionality exists: dashboard-export-btn element in social-dashboard-combined.html line 13
Export calls API endpoint: api/dnncorp/cmx/SpreadsheetExport/Excel to download Excel file
Export parameters include period, startDate, endDate, comparativeTerm, and moduleName
The feature cannot be tested via UI due to dashboard initialization failure
Root cause appears to be missing or incompatible 'utility.serializeCustomDate' function in the utility module
